org.activebpel.rt.bpel
Interface IAeBusinessProcess

All Known Subinterfaces:
IAeBusinessProcessInternal
All Known Implementing Classes:
AeBusinessProcess
public interface IAeBusinessProcess

Describes the interface used for interacting with business processes

Field Summary
static long NULL_PROCESS_ID
          Value of an uninitialized process id.
static int PROCESS_COMPENSATABLE
          The process has completed normally and is compensatable (process instance compensation).
static int PROCESS_COMPLETE
          Process has finished executing.
static int PROCESS_FAULTED
          State to indicate that the process has faulted.
static int PROCESS_LOADED
          State to indicate that the process has been created and ready for execution.
static int PROCESS_REASON_NONE
          Reason code for processes without a specific state reason
static int PROCESS_RUNNING
          Indicates that the process is currently executing.
static int PROCESS_SUSPENDED
          Indicates that the process is currently suspended.

resume

public void resume(boolean aExecute)
            throws AeBusinessProcessException
Resumes the business process.

Parameters:
aExecute - true to execute the process immediately or false to put the process in a running state without executing immediately.
Throws:
AeBusinessProcessException

aLocation - the location path of the object to resume.

aAtScope -

AeBusinessProcessException

completeActivity

public void completeActivity(java.lang.String aLocation)
                      throws AeBusinessProcessException
Step resume the process and mark the activity associated with passed location path as complete. The idea here is that the user has manually corrected any issues with the suspended activity or its enclosing scope and has put the process in a state where it can continue (without actually executing suspended the activity).

Parameters:
aLocation -
Throws:
AeBusinessProcessException

terminate

public void terminate()
               throws AeBusinessProcessException
Terminates the business process.

Throws:
AeBusinessProcessException

cancelProcess

public void cancelProcess()
                   throws AeBusinessProcessException

Throws:
AeBusinessProcessException

queueObjectToExecute

public void queueObjectToExecute(IAeBpelObject aObject)
                          throws AeBusinessProcessException
This method allows a parent to queue a child activity to execute.

Parameters:
aObject - The object that a parent says is ready to execute, links may still prevent this object from immediately executing.
Throws:
AeBusinessProcessException

getVariable

public IAeVariable getVariable(java.lang.String aActivityLoc,
                               java.lang.String aVarName)
Returns the variable being referenced in the activity location path. An optional part may be specified when dealing with a message type variable.

Parameters:
aActivityLoc - the location path for the activity which references this variable
aVarName - the name of the variable being referenced
Returns:
The variable or null if not found

setCreateMessage

public void setCreateMessage(AeInboundReceive aReceiveQueueObject)
Sets the message that created the process. The process will keep this until its start activity executes at which time it'll be consumed by that activity.

Parameters:
aReceiveQueueObject -

getStartDate

public java.util.Date getStartDate()
Get the date/time that the process instance was started.

                                AeInboundReceive aInboundReceive,
                                long aReplyId)
Dispatches message data to a message receiver (by location path id).

Parameters:
aLocationPathId - The location path id to the location awaiting the message
aInboundReceive - Contains the data and other properties for the inbound receive
aReplyId - queue manager replyId

                throws AeBusinessProcessException

Parameters:
aCallback -
Throws:
AeBusinessProcessException

releaseCompensationResources

public void releaseCompensationResources()
Releases any resources tied to process level compensation. Called when a compensatable process is no longer compensatable (likely owing to its coordination ending without having called compensate).

getBPELNamespace

public java.lang.String getBPELNamespace()
Getter for the BPEL namespace

public IAeFault getFault()
Returns the process fault or null if the process did not fault.

public boolean isFinalState()
Returns true if and only if the process is in a final state.

isNormalCompletion

public boolean isNormalCompletion()
Returns true if and only if the process completed normally.
